comment: Truth will always prevail! Everyone needs to be sharing the truth with as many people as possible! I apologize for being missing lately üòï üòî üòû I have a new schedule that is making it virtually impossible for me to make it üòî I am always with you in spirit ‚ù§ I just have to say to anyone who thinks that Johnny has ever been abusive to turd or anyone for that matter; I am a survivor of abuse and I have listened to the tapes,  I have read the court records and I have researched this and I promise you that he NEVER abused her! Johnny is the victim and ALL victims deserve justice! Their sex doesn't matter,  the only thing that matters is if someone is abused, they deserve justice and that is why #JusticeForJohnnyDepp is so important! This movement is for all of us who have ever been abused and either did or didn't see justice! Make no mistake,  this is not about being a fan,  it's about seeing a man get his life and his reputation back after suffering abuse from the person who is saying that she was the victim üò° #JusticeForJohnnyDepp  love you and your channel!
